top_comment.text: Its not what you know its who...﻿
top_comment.author: Steven Gonzalez

comments.text:
I wish we had laws regarding "Conflict of interest" here in the US. I'm 
becoming more and more aware of food labels and GMO's in everything we can 
consume. I enjoy local produce here in CO plenty. I'm glad we have a good 
amount of farmers markets.
comments.author: Steven Gonzalez

comments.text:
in Australia there is a law in place regarding 'Conflict of Interest'. 
Obviously that is not the case in the US and that is why companies like 
Monsato and others can do what they like when the politicians are in their 
pocket and are shareholders in the company. Ban GM foods, boycott their 
business, support locally produced goods and do what is right.
comments.author: Garry Harrison
